greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Count down from 2*k to 1, then from 2*(k+1) to 1 and so on.
mathematica: a253515[n_] := Block[{f}, f[x_] := 1 - x + Floor[Sqrt[x] + 3/2] * Floor[Sqrt[x] + 1/2]; Array[f, n]]; a253515[100] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jan 03 2015 *)
results.author: _Mikael Aaltonen_, Jan 03 2015
